Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash and cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: cash provided by used in financing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in financing activities
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Net Cash from Investing Activities: cash provided by used in investing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: exploration abandonment and impairment cash payments
payments to fund longterm loans to related parties
proceeds from collection of longterm loans to related parties
proceeds from sale of productive assets
increase decrease in capital accrual associated with investing activities
Purchases of Investments: net purchases sales of short term investments
payments for proceeds from short term investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in other operating capital net
increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
Net Cash from Operating Activities: cash provided by used in operating activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: accretion expense including asset retirement obligations
equity securities fv ni gain loss
equity securities fv ni unrealized gain loss
gain loss on sale of property plant equipment
income loss from equity method investments net of dividends or distributions
other operating activities cash flow statement

__unmapped__: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
payment to acquire productive assets and investments
